H0.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. New York

H1.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. Fort Duquesne

H2.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. Fort Ticonderoga

H3.text: General James Wolfe was killed at which battle in 1759. CA-QC

A4.text: The battle, which took place on 13 September 1759, was fought by the British Army and Royal Navy against the French Army on the Promontory of Quebec

A5.text: Both generals were mortally wounded during the battle; Wolfe died of gunshot wounds just as the French began to retreat
